metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43281 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Double Free vulnerability in Nothings Stb Image.h v.2.28 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file to thestbi_load_gif_main function.

criterions.comment: emscripten: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libsfml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
